entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -12.5°C
Wind: SW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Flurries beginning overnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
